titleInfo.title: 'File 5/10 Proposal for a Tank Ship of BAPCO to Fly the Bahrain Flag'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are circled, written in pencil and can be found in the top right of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the British Political Agency at Bahrain and Liutenant-Colonel Trenchard Craven William Fowle, the British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire. These papers concern the request by Captain Smith of the Bahrain Petroleum Company's tank ship W SRheemto fly the Bahrain flag and the possible issues that would cause.
